Nesting component-doc tags
---
{}
---
<vue-component-doc>
<vue-component-doc></vue-component-doc>
</vue-component-doc>
---
<vue-component-doc-test language="html">
<template v-slot:code>&lt;vue-component-doc&gt;&lt;/vue-component-doc&gt;</template>
<template v-slot:result><vue-component-doc></vue-component-doc></template>
</vue-component-doc-test>
